Question 9
A CNC worktable is driven in a linear direction by a lead screw connected
 
directly to a stepper motor. 
The pitch of the lead screw is 5 mm. The stepper
 
motor completes one full revolution upon receiving 600 
pulses. If the worktable
 
speed is 5 m/minute and there is no missed pulse, then the pulse rate being
 
received 
by the stepper motor is
(A) 20 kHz 
(B) 10 kHz 
(C) 3 kHz 
(D) 15 kHz
